channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Unified Theory

item.title: The Origin of Unified Theory
item.description: Sometime in late 2019 while perusing Hacker News, I came across a post Consume less, create more. Go read it. Actually, wait. We all know context switching feels good, but can we just… not. Still here? Great, you should still check out that article later. Essentially, the witty author recounts how their life is vastly weighted towards consuming media instead of creating it. I chuckled in the beginning of the article, but then I read something that felt like a hot iron in my head:
